These generated fonts can be used in all types of social media like Instagram for creating stand out bios, chatting on Facebook, writing impressive tweets on Twitter and so on..

How to use Font Generator?

Using this Font Generator extension is super easy, just type or paste your text in the text input area and it will automatically get converted to different cool fonts. Then you can select your desired font and just click on that font, it will get copied and you can use this font anywhere you want.
